languages.text: {n}Равор сжимает кулаки, горько глядя то на вас, то на Маражая. В его искаженном недовольной гримасой лице не дрогает ни одна мышца.{/n}
{n}Ravor clenches his fists, glaring bitterly at you, and then at Marazhai. Not a single muscle twitches in his face, which is contorted in a grimace of displeasure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Равор сжимает кулаки, горько глядя то на вас, то на Маражая. В его искаженном недовольной гримасой лице не дрогает ни одна мышца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor clenches his fists, glaring bitterly at you, and then at Marazhai. Not a single muscle twitches in his face, which is contorted in a grimace of displeasure.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor clenches his fists, glaring bitterly at you, and then at Marazhai. Not a single muscle twitches in his face, which is contorted in a grimace of displeasure.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor clenches his fists, glaring bitterly at you, and then at Marazhai. Not a single muscle twitches in his face, which is contorted in a grimace of displeasure.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}雷沃握紧双拳，狠狠地瞪了你一眼，又瞪了玛拉斋一眼。他脸上肌肉紧绷，表情愤怒至极。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor clenches his fists, glaring bitterly at you, and then at Marazhai. Not a single muscle twitches in his face, which is contorted in a grimace of displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃握紧双拳，狠狠地瞪了你一眼，又瞪了玛拉斋一眼。他脸上肌肉紧绷，表情愤怒至极。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Ravor aprieta los puños, clavándote una mirada de resentimiento primero a ti y luego a Marazhai. No mueve ni un solo músculo de su cara, que está contraída en una mueca de desagrado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor clenches his fists, glaring bitterly at you, and then at Marazhai. Not a single muscle twitches in his face, which is contorted in a grimace of displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor aprieta los puños, clavándote una mirada de resentimiento primero a ti y luego a Marazhai. No mueve ni un solo músculo de su cara, que está contraída en una mueca de desagrado.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Serrant les poings, Ravor vous adresse un regard furieux avant de se tourner vers Marazhai. Son visage est figé en une grimace de désapprobation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor clenches his fists, glaring bitterly at you, and then at Marazhai. Not a single muscle twitches in his face, which is contorted in a grimace of displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Serrant les poings, Ravor vous adresse un regard furieux avant de se tourner vers Marazhai. Son visage est figé en une grimace de désapprobation.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Ravor ballt die Fäuste und starrt erst dich und dann Marazhai verbittert an. Sein Gesicht ist absolut regungslos und zu einer missmutigen Grimasse verzerrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor clenches his fists, glaring bitterly at you, and then at Marazhai. Not a single muscle twitches in his face, which is contorted in a grimace of displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor ballt die Fäuste und starrt erst dich und dann Marazhai verbittert an. Sein Gesicht ist absolut regungslos und zu einer missmutigen Grimasse verzerrt.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは拳を握りしめ、あなたを、そしてマラズハイを恨めしげに睨みつける。その表情は微動だにせず、不快感を顕にしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor clenches his fists, glaring bitterly at you, and then at Marazhai. Not a single muscle twitches in his face, which is contorted in a grimace of displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアは拳を握りしめ、あなたを、そしてマラズハイを恨めしげに睨みつける。その表情は微動だにせず、不快感を顕にしている。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Yumruğunu sıkan Ravor; önce sana, sonra da Marazhai'a keskin bir bakış atıyor. Hoşnutsuz bir ifadeyle buruşan yüzündeki kaslardan bir tanesi bile hareket etmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor clenches his fists, glaring bitterly at you, and then at Marazhai. Not a single muscle twitches in his face, which is contorted in a grimace of displeasure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor, yumruğunu sıkarak önce sana, sonra da Marazhai'a keskin bir bakış fırlatıyor. Hoşnutsuz bir ifadeyle buruşan yüzündeki kaslardan bir tanesi bile hareket etmiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster
